pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karaṇapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññatto?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karaṇapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihari, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.26: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.27: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr2.10:6.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī coriṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:6.9: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:6.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #2
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.1: Ekā gāmantaraṃ gamanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:8.1: Samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāraṇapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:8.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāresi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:9.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:9.6: Sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.1: “Kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.2: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.8: “kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.9: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.1: Kupitāya anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.7: “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmī”ti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.1: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.7: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:13.1: Saṃsaṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:13.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā vihariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:14.2: Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:14.9: Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:15.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:15.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.3: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.4: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.8: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.10:18.3: Bhikkhunī jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.1: Yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.2: Yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.3: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.6: bhedakānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.7: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.8: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #3
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.1: Aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūraṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.2: Aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.4: “itthannāmaṃ okāsaṃ āgacchā”ti vuttā gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.7: aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūraṇapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #4
pli-tv-pvr2.10:22.1: Ussayavādikā bhikkhunī aḍḍaṃ karaṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:24.1: Ekā gāmantaraṃ gamanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:24.3: paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:25.1: Samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:26.1: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:27.1: “Kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:27.2: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti, uyyojanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:27.3: Tassā vacanena khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:28.1: Kupitā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:29.1: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:30.1: Saṃsaṭṭhā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:31.1: “Saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha, mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:34.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:34.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:34.5: dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati. #11
